entry.title: $1950 // NEWLY renovated 1bd private Patio Garden Apt-new appliances & cabinets
entry.content:
Recently renovated one bedroom apartment with a large private outdoor space on a tree-lined street in Prime East Harlem. Hard wood floor...tiled kitchen and brand stainless steel appliances. NEW STOVE, NEW REFRIGERATOR, NEW SINK, NEW Cabinets.

Only 2 blocks away from major subway lines (B,Q,6).
5-minute walk to Cherry Tree Park, Thai restaurant down the block.

Live in Super.

Laundrymat is 2 minutes away. Heat and hot water is included, need 1 month rent and 1 months security deposit, plus credit check,
